description:
An XML-based format for representing Western musical notation.  Represents the semantics of the underlying musical
data, designed as an interchange format for music notation, analysis, retrieval, and performance applications.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">xml</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: MusicXML, Version 3
